definition: rampart/base (in baseball)/to build with stones, bricks etc
to have one's defenses in good order (idiom)

sentences.english: The so-called "green barriers" cannot be completely eliminated in a short term.
sentences.chinese: 所謂的“綠色壁壘”短期內沒可能完全消除。

sentences.english: There was a rainbow of light and then they were through the hyper-space barrier.
sentences.chinese: 一道彩虹似的光閃過之後，他們就穿越了超空間壁壘。

sentences.english: Are the left and right so religiously cleaved ?
sentences.chinese: 至於左派與右派，在宗教信仰上是否也壁壘分明？

sentences.english: They have to pay hard cash to enter these fortified places.
sentences.chinese: 他們必須支付現金才能進入這些壁壘森嚴的地方。

sentences.english: The content introverts' camp closely borders the land of the socially anxious.
sentences.chinese: 內向者的營地將社交焦慮的領地壁壘森嚴地包圍起來。

sentences.english: Banks and communications companies would also gain opportunities through reductions in regulatory barriers.
sentences.chinese: 銀行和通信公司也將受益於管理壁壘的減少。

sentences.english: The practical result was to harden the battle lines.
sentences.chinese: 實際的結果就是雙方壁壘更加分明。

sentences.english: The remaining protectionist barriers only detract from those huge successes.
sentences.chinese: 殘存的保護主義壁壘只會損害這些卓著成果。

sentences.english: The government has raised tariff walls against foreign goods.
sentences.chinese: 政府已建立關稅壁壘以抵制舶來品。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the relations between green production, environmental protection and green barriers.
sentences.chinese: 該文分析了綠色產品，環境保護和綠色壁壘的關係。

sentences.english: Beyond language barriers, there exists an insurmountable artistic preference barrier.
sentences.chinese: 除了語言障礙，還有不可逾越的文化壁壘。

sentences.english: The Internet doesn’t have a technology barrier, it is largely open-source and doesn’t cost anything.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網沒有任何的技術壁壘，它是開源和低成本的。

sentences.english: But lowering trade barriers can help compete away monopoly profits.
sentences.chinese: 而降低貿易壁壘有助於通過競爭減少壟斷利潤。

sentences.english: Return to Mehlar at the Bulwark when you have done this.
sentences.chinese: 當完成這些的時候回到亡靈壁壘的梅拉那裏。

sentences.english: Still any barriers at corporate level that need to get worked through before penetration increases further?
sentences.chinese: 在合作層面還有任何壁壘需要在繼續滲透前努力的嗎？

sentences.english: But perhaps these cultural boundaries exist to prevent Israelites from abominations?
sentences.chinese: 但也許這些文化壁壘的存在保護了以色列人免遭憎惡？

definition: to try hard to/to strive to
(fig.) gulf/chasm/wide gap/(originally) the Hong Canal in Henan, which in ancient times formed the border between enemies Chu 楚 and Han 漢|汉
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
profitable to both sides/a win-win situation
